Sentence: the fire led to a massive lawsuit filed today by four survivors and the families of four victims. they 're suing 27 defendants including the club , the band , companies with ties to the club , the town as well as the state. all told , they are seeking $100 million. that 's only that one group of people. it 's a federal suit because the plaintiffs are from out of state but rode ilt residents are pursuing suits of them. one by the name of mr. castle. he lost 25 friends in that blaze. he joins us tonight from providence , rose island , along with his lawyer ronald resmini. and they 're getting set up. walter castle , as we said , was in the building , was not injured physically on the outside , but had internal damages , he says , and that is one of things we 're going to talk with him about. you are looking at some of the images. we 're going to take a quick break while we get them miked up. and we 'll do the interview right after. yeah , sprinkles would be great !
